name: pepinfo
description: Plot amino acid properties of a protein sequence in parallel

options.description: Protein sequence filename and optional format, or reference (input USA)
[$EMBOSS_GRAPHICS value, or png] Graph type (ps, hpgl, hp7470, hp7580, meta, cps, tek, tekt, none, data, png, gif, svg)
[Eaa_properties.dat] Amino acid chemical classes data file
[Eaa_hydropathy.dat] Amino acid hydropathy values data file
[9] Window size for hydropathy averaging (Integer 1 or more)
Do not plot histogram of general properties
Do not plot graphs of hydropathy
Report command line options and exit. More information on associated and general qualifiers can be found with -help -verbose
